name: Charles SKOLNICK and Sarah Skolnick, his wife, Appellants, v. FORD MOTOR CREDIT COMPANY
name_abbreviation: Skolnick v. Ford Motor Credit Co.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., dissent.
parties: Charles SKOLNICK and Sarah Skolnick, his wife, Appellants, v. FORD MOTOR CREDIT COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Arnold Levin, Philadelphia, Joel Weisberg, Lee C. Swartz, Harrisburg, for appellants.
William H. Lowery, Fred T. Magaziner, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
482 A.2d 1275
Charles SKOLNICK and Sarah Skolnick, his wife, Appellants, v. FORD MOTOR CREDIT COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1984.
Decided Nov. 5, 1984.
Arnold Levin, Philadelphia, Joel Weisberg, Lee C. Swartz, Harrisburg, for appellants.
William H. Lowery, Fred T. Magaziner, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
